attributes.action: Permit Smoking Licences To Be Created
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the Public Health Act 2006 smoking in public places shall be made illegal from summer next year. This in my opinion is positive; apart from killing cigar orientated institutions such as cigar shops where one might try before one buys and brilliantly atmospheric divans where one might enjoy a quiet coffee, cigar and jazz such as those available in great establishments across London. I propose an exemption system be available for dedicated smoking institutions for the appreciation of fine tobacco products where persons under the age of 16 are not permitted
